data.actual_result: It stays blank, implying nothing is wrong, allowing you to be ratelimited if you end up spamming it.
data.expected_result: A popup error should appear saying "This field is required", as is the case with the main login screen.
data.short_description: No error message when hitting login on the 2FA code screen without entering a 2FA code
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have 2FA enabled on your account - Logout of the client via User Settings - Log in with your email and password - Press login on the 2FA screen without typing in a 2FA code
